Number format: Percent

Applies the percentage format to the selected cells.

Number Format: Percent

You can also enter a percentage sign (%) after a number in a cell:

1% corresponds to 0.01

1 + 16% corresponds to 116% or 1.16

1%% corresponds to 0.0001

Related Topics

Format - Cell - Numbers
